This technique is almost identical to [[True Reverse Lotus]], but Guy slams the opponent down and then tosses them into the air, instead of just kicking them into the air. The light beams are also larger and the punch used at the end is much more intense.

[[pt-br:Derradeira Lótus Reversa]]
